unnormalised: Aiyo, Adv. Sharma mhonta ki civil code-achea pormonnem, chacha-chi property sogllea kaideachea warasank soman vanttun dilea zateli, taka tachea will-ant dusrem kitem-ui aslem tori. Mhunnche basically, beta, eka vakilak ASAP uchchar!
normalised: Aiyo, advocate Sharma mhonta ki civil code-achea pormonnem, chacha-chi property sogllea kaidhesir warasank soman vantunk yetali, tachea will-ant dusrem kitem-ui aslem tori. Mhunnge beta, ekshear vakilacho sol'lo ghe ASAP!
